name: Ninja Bullet
description:
You're attacked in your house! But they didn't know that your were a Ninja, attack them with your almighty kick!

Credits:

  • Gauthier Picot: Helped us find the concept
  • Antoine Semblat (Twitter / Patreon): Game designer & programmer
  • Angéline Daquin: 2D Artist
  • Aurélien Monetero (Twitter) : Music & Sound Design
